Key Match Events: Fans threw baseballs, water bottles and trash at Padres outfielder Jurickson Profar after taunting a fan in the first inning.
Umpires stopped the game for several minutes to calm fans before restarting play.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans said Padres players were taunting them all night.
Post-Match Reflections: In a postgame interview Profar said the situation felt 'dangerous,' and that he had a similar experience with San Francisco Giants fans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres are limiting ticket sales to Dodgers fans for game three and four at Petco Park.

Online tickets directly from the Padres organization can only be purchased by residents of San Diego, Baja California and Imperial, southern Orange, southern Riverside, La Paz, Mohave, Yuma and Clark counties.
